thread.title: Montana gave Elway’s Broncos no chance in Super Bowl XXIV
thread.title_full: Montana gave Elway’s Broncos no chance in Super Bowl XXIV - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Michael Lerseth
title: Montana gave Elway’s Broncos no chance in Super Bowl XXIV
text: In the week after Super Bowl XXIV, the joke that made the rounds had all the speed limit signs on Colorado freeways being changed to “49ers 55, Broncos 10.”
